Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class PlayerTurn

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayerTurn
public class PlayerTurn
extends java.lang.Object
PlayerTurn class is created to store an entire turn of a player until he sends a PlayerMoveEnd. It gives information about: Player, Worker used in his turn and a pointer to the current Step

    • updateStep

      public void updateStep()
      It updates current step and index. It's called each time player has finished a single step of his PlayerTurn

      It resets current step at the end of a PlayerTurn, so that it's ready for the next round

      Returns:
